FlipperHost.com Exclusive VPS Offer, 1GB starting at $2.90/mo

atlanta, los angeles, miami, texas April 3, 2017 @ 8:56 pm, by Matt Zelasko


Hello everyone! The folks over at FlipperHost have sent over a few nice offers that we’re excited to share with you guys. We’ve featured FlipperHost several times over the years and they’ve always done a spectacular job responding to questions and concerns, which is one of the reasons we’ll keep posting their offers.

They’re a registered company in Dubai and their WHOIS is public. You can find their ToS/Legal docs here.

They accept PayPal, 2checkout, Skrill, and all major credit cards as forms of payment.

In their own words: 

“Flipper Host is a privately owned and operated global hosting provider incorporated in 2009 as a sub company of Invest Lion Group. Flipper Host eventually grew to become a full-service provider in, shared web hosting, reseller hosting, dedicated servers, Virtual Private Servers (VPS), Windows VPS, VDS and KVM servers as well as complex hosting solutions. Flipper Host has grown to become one of the well known Hosting Solution providers Worldwide.

As we grew, we began expanding at multiple locations with multiple datacenters proven to be to our advantage as we are able to segregate facilities from one another to provide redundancy, resiliency, and performance. As a result Flipper Host is now available in Dallas, TX, Miami, FL, and the most recent Atlanta, GA.

Flipper Host is staffed 24/7 by industry professionals with years of IT experience, insuring you the highest level of service and satisfaction possible.”

Here are the offers:

FlipperHost 1
1 GB RAM
1 GB vSwap
4 CPU Cores
25GB HDD space
5 TB Bandwidth
100 Mbps uplink
1 x IPv4 address
3 x IPv6 address
OpenVZ/SolusVM
$2.90/Month
$29.00/Year
Order Here
